title: Gunnerkrigg Court - Complete through March 2015 {WebComixFan}
description:
"GUNNERKRIGG COURT" Web Comic

"Gunnerkrigg Court" (gunnerkrigg.com) by Tom Siddell is a science-fantasy Web comic.  It has been critically acclaimed, has won numerous Web Cartoonists' Choice Awards, and has received positive reviews for its artwork and storytelling.  The comic tells the story of Antimony Carver, a young girl attending a strange and mysterious school called Gunnerkrigg Court, and the events that unfold around her as she becomes embroiled in political intrigues between Gunnerkrigg Court and the inhabitants of the Gillitie Wood, a forest outside the school.  The comic's style and themes include elements from science, fantasy, various mythological traditions, and alchemical symbols and theories; the literary style is heavily influenced by mystery and manga comics.

This torrent collects "Gunnerkrigg Court" comics from the strip's beginning in 2005 to the end of chapter 50 in March 2015.  Though the chapters are grouped in the CBR files in a manner corresponding to the published collections of the comic, the CBRs are NOT scans of the books; all the comics in this torrent were downloaded directly from the gunnerkrigg.com Web site
